email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for an iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 160,000 MT on CIF terms. The starting freight rate is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 18.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 October?

Best,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 160,000 MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 16-21 October
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah
